abstract: Scene at Recette restaurant in New York City described as two friends catch up.
snippet: On the second Monday of each month, Recette in the West Village hosts Mondays with Jesse, a quiet, elegant evening that includes a 10-course tasting menu.
lead_paragraph: On the second Monday of each month, Recette in the West Village hosts Mondays with Jesse, a quiet, elegant evening that includes a 10-course tasting menu.

headline.main: When a Casual Classic Gets Dressed Up
headline.print_headline: When a Casual Classic Gets Dressed Up
headline.seo: Casual Recette Gets Dressed Up for Mondays With Jesse
